channel.title: 🏢 Zhejiang Lab on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Zhejiang Lab on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Huber Loss Minimization Approach to Mean Estimation under User-level Differential Privacy
item.description: Huber loss minimization ensures accurate and robust mean estimation under user-level differential privacy, especially for imbalanced datasets and heavy-tailed distributions.
